name: nodekit-darwin-lite
description: The universal, open-source, embedded engine that provides a full Node.js instance inside desktop and mobile applications for OS X, iOS, Android, and Windows.

scripts.publish: git add . -A && git commit -m "v0.8.10" && git tag -a v0.8.10 -m "v0.8.10" && git push origin master --tags

author: OffGrid Networks
